Package jkarel

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • jkarel.Item
      • jkarel.Robot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Robot
extends Item
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The Robot defines robot attributes and actions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Robot​()
      Constructor (default) defines robot item at (1,1), facing EAST and having no beepers (0).
      Robot​(int x, int y, int direction, int beepers)
      Constructor (alternative) defines robot item at (x,y), facing World.direction and carrying beepers.
      Robot​(int x, int y, int direction, int beepers, int color)
      Constructor (alternative) defines robot item at (x,y), facing World.direction and carrying colored beepers.
      Robot​(int x, int y, int direction, int beepers, int color, java.lang.String name)
      Constructor (alternative) defines robot item at (x,y), facing World.direction and carrying colored beepers.
      Robot​(int x, int y, int direction, int beepers, java.lang.String name)
      Constructor (alternative) defines robot item at (x,y), facing World.direction and carrying beepers.
